title: Under Par Analytics LLC
text:
Our deep dive analysis provides private golf clubs with invaluable insights into how their members use their facilities.
Data driven clubs operate and are governed more effectively.


We know that every golf club is unique, with its own set of challenges and opportunities. That’s why we take a customized approach to data analysis, tailoring our services to meet the specific needs of each individual club.



We are dedicated to providing you with the most accurate and comprehensive analysis possible, using best practices analytical techniques to uncover insights that might otherwise go unnoticed.



We specialize in a variety of areas, including member persona analysis, facility usage analysis, revenue and expense analysis, and more. Our reports are easy to understand, presented to club management and board members in a clear and concise manner.



Whether you’re looking to embark on a major strategic campaign, reduce expenses, absorb new membership, or simply gain a better understanding of how your club is being used, Under Par Analytics will help. We provide actionable results that help you optimize your club’s operations and governance and improve member satisfaction.
Contact us today to learn more about our bespoke data analysis services.

title: TJ Murphy PhD
text:
Dr. Murphy is the Founder of Under Par Analytics. Prior to starting this company TJ worked for over 30 years as a biomedical research scientist and teacher. That work involved using sophisticated statistical methods to wrangle insights from complex biological data sets. Then communicating those results to diverse audiences. TJ taught statistics for over a decade to more than 500 biomedical PhD students. He launched the internet startup Gradschoolmatch in 2013, which was acquired by ETS in 2020. When not exploring data, TJ enjoys golfing and zipping around Atlanta on his ebike.


University of Missouri-Columbia | Columbia, MO
PhD in Pharmacology | 1988
BS in Biochemistry | 1984



Emory University School of Medicine | Atlanta, GA
Tenured professor | 1989 to 2022
Gradschoolmatch | World wide web
Founder | 2013 to 2020
